scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures gathered around a sarcophagus, which is covered with a white cloth. In the foreground, a woman kneels with her hands clasped in prayer. Behind her, several other individuals, including men and women, stand and observe. To the right, within an architectural structure, a figure holds a baby. The background shows a glimpse of a city or landscape with buildings. The overall setting appears to be within a religious or funerary context, possibly a chapel or a tomb.
